name.br: Pergaminho das Habilidades de Grupo (30 dias)
name.jp: パーティスキルの巻物（30日）
name.sp: Pergamino Habilidad de Grupo de 30 días
name.th: 30 วัน Scroll of Party Skill

description.en: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Permite acumular as Habilidades do Grupo, combinando sua duração, mas não os efeitos. Funciona quando é ativado pelo líder. (Dura 30 dias a partir da ativação, mesmo quando desconectado)
description.cns: 允许剧团技能叠加，组合提高它们持续时间，但不影响其效果。当团长激活它时有效。(激活后持续30天，离线计时)
description.de: Ermöglicht das Stapeln von Gruppenfertigkeiten und kombiniert deren Dauer, aber nicht deren Wirkung. Funktioniert, wenn der Anführer der Gruppe sie aktiviert hat. (Hält 30 Tage ab Aktivierung, auch wenn ausgeloggt)
description.fi: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: Permet de lancer les compétences de groupe plusieurs fois pour augmenter la durée des bonus lorsque le chef de groupe active ce parchemin. Les parchemins de coordination peuvent être cumulés. (Dure 30 jours à partir de l'activation, même si vous êtes déconnecté)
description.id: Memungkinkan Party Skills untuk ditumpuk, menggabungkan durasinya, tetapi tidak berpengaruh. Bekerja ketika pemimpin party mengaktifkannya. (Berlangsung 30 hari sejak aktivasi, bahkan jika log off)
description.it: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: パーティスキルの持続時間を重複させることができます。パーティリーダーがアクティブの間のみ機能します。（30日間有効で、ログアウト中も経過する）
description.kr: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.nl: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.pl: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.ru: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.sp: Al activarlo, permite acumular Habilidad de Grupo, combinando su duración, pero no su efecto. (Dura 30 días desde la activación, incluso si se desconecta)
description.sw: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: อนุญาตให้ใช้ Party Skills ซ้อนกัน รวมระยะเวลา แต่ไม่มีผล ใช้งานได้เมื่อหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เปิดใช้งาน (มีอายุ 30 วันนับจากการเปิดใช้งาน แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 允許將劇團技能疊加，結合其持續時間，但不疊加效果，當團長激活它時有效。（自激活後持續 30 天，即使已離線任然有效）
description.vi: Cho phép xếp chồng các Party Skills lên nhau, kết hợp thời hạn của chúng, nhưng không có hiệu lực. Hoạt động khi lãnh đạo nhóm đã kích hoạt nó. (Kéo dài trong 30 ngày kể từ ngày kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
